text.section:
In this section, "labeled milk can" means any milk can, cream can, or case that:
Belongs to an owner, dealer, or shipper of milk or cream who ships the milk or cream to any place in this State; and
Has the name or initials of the owner, dealer, or shipper stamped, marked, or fastened on it.

A person may not:
Use, sell, dispose of, buy, or traffic in labeled milk cans, without the consent of the owner, dealer, or shipper;
Willfully change the name or initials of the owner, dealer, or shipper stamped, marked, or fastened on the labeled milk can without the consent of the owner, dealer, or shipper; or
Place in any labeled milk can any substance other than milk or cream, without the consent of the owner, dealer, or shipper.
